text: "La Primavera" is a 1998 song by the German DJ group Sash! and it features singer Patrizia Salvatore. It is the first single from Sash!'s second studio album Life Goes On (Sash! album) which was released on 17 August 1998. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1998) Peak position Denmark (IFPI) 2 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 4 Hungary (Mahasz) 8 Iceland (√çslenski Listinn Topp 40) 5 Italy (Musica e dischi) 8 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1998) Position Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 66 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 65 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 41 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 80 UK Singles (OCC) 52 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Sash! songs
title: La Primavera (song)
